description: 20 year old Spencer has just started his sophomore year in college and he says he's going to try and take things a little more seriously this year.He tells us that last year it was nothing but parties all the time. He's in a fraternity and was voted 'social chairman' because he always had all the best information about where the fun was.Well, he likes to have fun when it comes to sex too. Watch Spencer in his Next Door Male debut as he has fun in the kitchen and then bedroom, and whips out one of his toys for an extra added pleasure bonus for himself.
title: Spencer Reed
